entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
